# Mobius portal

It's a portal in form of the Mobius strip.

# Origin

I invented this portal by myself, but it was presented in program [Polycut](https://facstaff.susqu.edu/brakke/polycut/polycut.htm) which is very old. I recommend to check out this program. I have plans to move all scenes from this program to this Portal Explorer :D

# Knot portals

Also, I suggest you to check out [KnotPortal](https://imaginary.org/program/knotportal).
